categories.title: Rent
categories.comment: We lived in our own apartment. So nothing here.

categories.title: Mortgage
categories.comment: No mortgage. Woo-hoo!

categories.title: Utilities
categories.comment: We didn't optimize anything here. But we love 2-minute showers.

categories.title: Tax
categories.comment: TODO: taxes

categories.title: Repairs
categories.comment: After spending ₽1,000,000 here in 2016, we started to make our own furniture and paint the walls ourself. Our finished appartment (2018) on the-village.ru

categories.title: Groceries
categories.comment: Really low here thanks to the employer.

categories.title: Eating out
categories.comment: Most of our eating out were sponsored by the employer.

categories.title: Alcohol
categories.comment: Wow! Almost a sober year.

categories.title: Gas
categories.comment: Most of our trips were to hardware stores. And highway driving almost all the time.

categories.title: Maintenance
categories.comment: Opel Meriva is a pretty durable car. 150 000 km and just regular maintenance.

categories.title: Insurance
categories.comment: Nastya got her license. Huge up here.

categories.title: Parking
categories.comment: No driving to the city—no parking.

categories.title: Public transport
categories.comment: Metro and bus.

categories.title: Car rent
categories.comment: No car sharing this year.

categories.title: Taxi
categories.comment: Nastya’s after-work drives and some of our late nights together.

categories.title: Health Insurance
categories.comment: My insurance was paid by the employer. Nastya had basic government insurance.

categories.title: Doctor visits
categories.comment: Nastya’s orthodontist and some analyses.

categories.title: Pharmacy
categories.comment: Dental supplies and medicine.

categories.title: Entertainment
categories.comment: Tickets to In Flames, Bullet For My Valentine, Nogu Svelo. A whole lot of fun this year!

categories.title: Education
categories.comment: Nastya took English, driving, and haircutting classes. I took a carpenter class and paid for English video sessions on italki.

categories.title: Sport
categories.comment: Only a pull-up bar in the office. So no spending here.

categories.title: Hobbies and arts
categories.comment: My folk-singing classes.

categories.title: Clothing
categories.comment: Nastya’s dresses. Ha-ha! Don’t remember exactly what we bought here.

categories.title: Tech & Gadgets
categories.comment: This year we bought a cheap amplifier instead of an expensive one. And Moto G5 Plus after my phone was broke.

categories.title: Home stuff
categories.comment: IKEA for our apartment.

categories.title: Work supplies
categories.comment: This is Nastya’s hair trimmer.

categories.title: Household goods
categories.comment: Washing supplies etc.

categories.title: Cell phone
categories.comment: Regular expenses for the mobile operator.

categories.title: Subscriptions
categories.comment: Grammarly, Evernote, domain, and site hosting.

categories.title: Personal
categories.comment: This is a special category for Nastya’s spending :)

categories.title: Misc
categories.comment: The major part is my Craiglist bicycle. The second major part is old debt repayment.

categories.title: Hotels
categories.comment: Trips to Greece and Hungary on Christmas.

categories.title: Travel Transportation
categories.comment: I like to split up our travel expenses to see what's going on.

categories.title: Travel Entertainment
categories.comment: Boat to Chrysi island. Ski-passes for snowboarding in Slovakia next year.

categories.title: Food and other
categories.comment: Mostly eating out.

categories.title: Presents
categories.comment: We visited Nastya's family in Hungary. The major part is the gifts.

categories.title: Parties hosting
categories.comment: Some rare parties.

categories.title: Charity
categories.comment: To our shame almost nothing here.

categories.title: Taxes and fees
categories.comment: Our taxes were paid by the employer. We actually don't see how much we pay taxes in Russia. This is terrible. People don't ask for the service they paid for.

categories.title: Fines
categories.comment: We left our car in an inappropriate place.

categories.title: Investments
categories.comment: We had some dividend income. I'll add it later.

categories.title: Paycheck
categories.comment: I worked as a designer at Yandex. Nastya is a hairdresser working with individual clients.

categories.title: Side hustle
categories.comment: Some design work on weekends and commute trips.

categories.title: Interest
categories.comment: Interest on debit card funds and cashback.

categories.title: Stuff sales
categories.comment: We sold audio equipment and Nastya's bicycle this year.

categories.title: Presents
categories.comment: Thanks to the family for the generous gifts.

categories.title: Other
categories.comment: Tax refund and BlaBlaCar drives with strangers.
